item.title: Boris Ryzhy (1974-2001)
item.description: Documentary and Portrait More about Ryzhy’s life (and the reasons behind his early death) in the documentary by Aliona van der Horst (2009, 59 m). Introduction (2 m) below (with music by Beirut ); see also this one (1 m).
